nodes.body: These are rituals for confessing, atoning for, making amends for, and repairing one's relationship to (chiefly) protector deities.
nodes.title: Description

nodes.body:
• Zhi khro’i las byang gi kha skong skong chog, Skong bshags kyi cho ga nyon mongs sreg byed
  • Mar me’i skong bshags kyi bkol byang
  • See also skong chog; skong/bskang bshags; ‘khrugs skong
nodes.title: Example Texts
